publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6712 Aileen Campbell: Congratulations to Milton Youth FC—That the Parliament congratulates Milton Rovers Youth FC on receiving the Queen’s Award for Voluntary Service, which recognises the outstanding contribution of voluntary groups to their local communities; notes with pride that Milton Rovers Youth FC is the first youth football club in the United Kingdom to achieve this status, and recognises the continued success of voluntary groups in Lanarkshire, with 13 from the area having won the award in the eight years since its launch. Supported by: Kenneth Gibson*, Jim Hume*, Bill Kidd*, Angela Constance*, Bob Doris*, Gil Paterson*, Christina McKelvie*, Anne McLaughlin*, Jamie McGrigor*, Pauline McNeill*, Christopher Harvie*, Robin Harper*
S3M-6712 Congratulations to Milton Youth FC (lodged on 5 July 2010) Maureen Watt*
